# The `SCEVAAResult` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A simple alias analysis implementation that uses <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> to answer queries. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

## Description {#details}

A simple alias analysis implementation that uses <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> to answer queries.
